mapper.select: select c.`card_id` cardId,c.`card_number` cardNumber,c.`bank_id` bankId,b.bank_name bankName, c.`card_user_name` cardUserName, c.`card_user_id` cardUserId, c.`bank_bonus` bankBonus, c.`statement_date` statementDate, c.`repayment_date` repaymentDate, c.`create_time` createTime, c.`status` status, c.`id_number` idNumber, c.`real_name` realName from card c LEFT JOIN bank b on c.bank_id = b.bank_id where card_user_id = #{userId}
